eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
 d s^2 &=& r^2 {\biggl [}\frac{1}{y_+^2}\frac{{\cal F}}{u'v'}du'dv'+
 d\theta^2 + \sin^2\!\theta \,d\phi^2 {\biggr ]} \nonumber \\
      &=&  r^2 {\biggl [}-\frac{(y+y_+)^2}{y_+^2}du'dv'+
 d\theta^2 + \sin^2\!\theta \,d\phi^2 {\biggr ]} \:, \nonumber \\
 \label{A.1.2}
